Posts.Content: purplepassion03 wrote: Hello,  I'm new to this site and being diagnosed.  I had a mammogram July 2012 and another Nov 22, 2013.  Ultrasound Dec 12, 2013, biopsy Dec 26, 2013 and then diagnosed Jan 2, 2014!  Happy New Years!   I was told it was caught early, was very small and was a blessing .  I have a ruptered implant on the left side but I also have a defibrillator implant as well.  I'm 53.  I gave myself 1 day to cry and now i'm just ready to get this done.  I have made it my mission to talk to old friends, new friends or anyone I can to share my story.  Early detection, regular mammograms.  Just do it!  I've never written on a board before so I hope I didn't ramble too much. Thanks for reading, purplepassion03 Dx 1/2/2014, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: hurry up and wait mode purplepassion03 JanOnancock
